issue.title: [Format] Factor Flatbuffer schema metadata into a Schema.fbs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-662](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-662). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Let's do this after the open patches against the format are resolved but:

it would be useful to split the Schema, Type, and Field flatbuffer types into a separate file, so that Schema can be reused more easily in other Flatbuffers files.
